form.official-title: To exempt certain forest management activities in Yosemite National Park from requirements of section 102 of the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969, and for other purposes.

section.header: Categorical exclusion for certain forest management activities in Yosemite National Park

subsection.text: The forest management activities described in subsection (b) are a category of activities hereby designated as being categorically excluded from the preparation of an environmental assessment or an environmental impact statement under section 102 of the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969 (42 U.S.C. 4332).

subsection.header: Forest management activities designated for categorical exclusion
